item.title: New York AG appeals reversal of Trump's $500 million fraud penalty
item.description: A lower court said in August that the huge fine on President Donald Trump and his company violated the U.S. Constitution's ban on excessive fines.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to let him fire FTC Commissioner Rebecca Slaughter
item.description: President Donald Trump in March removed two Democratic commissioners from their posts at the Federal Trade Commission.

item.title: DC sues Trump administration over National Guard deployment
item.description: President Donald Trump last month put the D.C. police department under federal control and deployed hundreds of National Guard troops to the city.

item.title: Pulte refuses to say where he got Lisa Cook mortgage fraud ‘tip’
item.description: President Donald Trump's housing finance chief Bill Pulte has accused Cook of claiming multiple properties as her primary residence.

item.title: White House lambasts $2 trillion Norwegian wealth fund's Caterpillar exit
item.description: U.S. officials hit out at the fund's exit from American machinery maker Caterpillar, which came amid concerns to the firm's ties to the conflict in Ga...
